OOC: How is he going to dodge that? Well.... its a secret and as far as you 
bringing in hugar I dont remember him ever saying he was your lap dog and 
would do everything you say. He reads the post he knows whats going on, if he 
finds a problem with it or nother council member finds something so wrong 
they will bring it up and say to possibly to change it. Also demanding a 
person to take damage doesn't really look good for you and claiming that they 
will be moderated because you want them to be also doesn't make you look 
good. And as for a mutate making a barrier when he got scared that caused 
damage, that never happened, when he got sacred he channeled energy in its 
mouth and fired it at at a bot. And what type of radiation is it? Nuclear? 
Energon? If its nuclear then I believe thats illegal am I correct Rauq?

--part1_12.14df269f.291542a8_boundary
